name: Kid Icarus: Uprising Montage
formal_name: Kid Icarus: Uprising™ – Gameplay Trailer Montage in 3D
description:
Download this exclusive 3D montage of four released Kid Icarus: Uprising™ gameplay trailers! Throughout his epic odyssey, Pit will encounter numerous foes as he ventures through the Underworld and beyond, and in this montage you will discover some of these impressive characters.

This montage includes trailers for: Hades, Lord of the Underworld / Viridi, Goddess of Nature / Mysterious Invaders / Palutena’s Temple

Within the game Kid Icarus: Uprising™, each chapter delivers nonstop action over land and air. Throughout the game, collect different weapons and determine which is best suited for each battle to fend off enemies, including Medusa and her Underworld Army. Beyond the challenging campaign mode, experience two different multiplayer battle modes where as many as six players with their own Kid Icarus: Uprising™ game cards can compete against each other in local and online battles* (*Wireless broadband internet access required for online play.)
